# Compiled source files
*.class

# Log files
*.log

# Blueprints (IDE specific)
.idea/
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws
.vscode/
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# Build directories
/target/
/bin/
/out/

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Maven specific
.mvn/
!/.mvn/wrapper/maven-wrapper.jar
mvnw
mvnw.cmd

# Environment files
.env
*.env

# IntelliJ cache
.idea/
*.iws
*.iml
*.ipr

# Eclipse
*.launch
.metadata
*.bak
*.tmp
*.swp

# Test reports
/test-output/
/surefire-reports/
/jacoco.exec

# Generated files
*.war
*.jar
*.ear

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*~.nib

# Spring Boot devtools
.spring-boot-devtools.properties
.spring-boot-devtools.restart.enabled

# Database
*.h2.db
*.mv.db
*.trace.db

# Local configuration
application-local.yml
application-dev.yml
application-local.properties
application-dev.properties

# Docker
docker-compose.override.yml
*.pid
